title: Vaxxed in the Stacks: COVID-19 Vaccine Clinic
description: The Platte County Health Department will host this COVID-19 vaccine clinic, which is free to attend and no registration is required.
cleaned_text: Fri, Aug 13 2021 9:00am - 11:00am Subjects Age Group For adults Presenter Health Department Platte County The Platte County Health Department will host this COVID-19 vaccine clinic, which is free to attend and no registration is required. Attendees will have the opportunity to receive their first or second dose of the Pfizer or Moderna vaccines or the one and only dose of the Johnson & Johnson vaccine. More information can be found on the health department's website at plattecountyhealthdept.com or by phone at 816.858.2412. [](/events/all-times/Vaxxed in the Stacks: COVID-19 Vaccine Clinic)
